title: Yoho
whats_it_like: Classic whitewater in an intimidating canyon.
scouting_portaging: Scouting is possible for most rapids. The hardest rapid of the run is impossible to portage, some other rapids could be portaged if wood was in play.

time.original: ~3 hours to show yourself down, 1 hour if you know the lines.

when_to_go: Typically runs in August, however can be caught at runnable flows all summer long and into the late fall if you pay attention to weather and snowpack.
